CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c , 'Daily'), Name + ' - ' + TEXT(TODAY()), IF(ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c , 'Weekly'), Name + ' - Week of ' + TEXT(TODAY()), IF(ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c , 'Monthly'), Name + ' - ' + CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sept", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", 12, "Dec", "None") + '-' + TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())), null)))
CustomField.label: Cloned Append Name
